title: Adventure Music Pack
description: 20 high quality music tracks including loop versions, which offer you the right orchestral sound to go into battle or ride on some fire spitting dragon with style.
longDescription:
IMAscore’s Epic Adventure Music Pack contains 20 high quality music tracks including loop versions of each track, which offer you the right orchestral sound to go into battle or ride on some fire spitting dragon with style. All tracks are royalty free, mixed and mastered, ready to use!


PREVIEW: https://youtu.be/zJ5KfsHBvkM


Content:


  1. Winterstorm [03:19] + Loop [02:55]
  2. A Story Untold [02:59] + Loop [02:48]
  3. Castle of Ice [03:05] + Loop [2:54]
  4. Here It Begins [02:21] + Loop [02:07]
  5. Hope and Glory [02:22] + Loop [02:12]
  6. Legions [01:54] + Loop [01:48]
  7. Paradigma [01:46] + Loop [01:43]
  8. Invictum [05:27] + Loop [05:24]
  9. Fly To The Hills [02:35] + Loop [02:24]
  10. Epic Guardians [02:03] + Loop [01:56]
  11. The Forsaken [02:16] + Loop [02:04]
  12. Leaving Home [01:49] + Loop [01:47]
  13. The Awakening [02:50] + Loop [02:48]
  14. Grand Nature [02:39] + Loop [02:32]
  15. Immortal [03:12] + Loop [03:08]
  16. Leave For Battle [03:10] + Loop [03:04]
  17. Start The Journey [01:51] + Loop [01:47]
  18. Skyscraper [02:06] + Loop [02:00]
  19. Memento Mori [03:07] + Loop [03:02]
  20. Into The War [03:28] + Loop [03:10]
technicalDetails:
• Audio Wavs: 40
  • Audio Cues: 20 (choose between loop and single track version)
  • Format: 44.1 kHz, 16 bit, Stereo, WAV
  • Size: 1.12 GB
  • Does music loop: Yes
  • Minutes of audio provided: 1h 45min 52sec
  • Supported Platforms: All



Who we are

IMAscore is a leading audio production studio, bringing to you cutting edge music and sound since 2009. We are a team of composers and sound designers and proved our versatility with hundreds of projects we’re proud to be a part of, from Trailer Music for blockbuster movies or AAA games to all those small and big projects from all kinds of areas.


And you know what? We love games – we always did! That’s why we want to give your projects the high-quality audio they deserve, with releases designed to meet the needs of the game industry. Rest assured: This is just the beginning of a highscore beating, emotion blasting and goosebumps creating relationship!

In case you don’t find what you’re looking for in the asset packs we’re offering right now, we know how to handle your very individual ideas and wishes! You won’t regret getting in touch with us!
